mapper.select: select o.id, o.order_time, o.good_price, o.order_state, oi.id oid, oi.count, p.product_id, p.product_price, p.product_name, p.product_image from d_order o left join order_item oi on o.id = oi.order_id left join product p on oi.product_id = p.product_id where o.id = #{id}

select dor.id, dor.good_price, dor.order_time, dor.order_state, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.nickName, da.mobile, da.address, da.address_id, da.receive_name from d_order dor left join d_address da on dor.addr_id = da.address_id left join user u on dor.user_id = u.user_id where dor.id = #{id}

select o.id, o.order_time, o.good_price, o.order_state, oi.id oid, oi.count, p.product_id, p.product_price, p.product_name, p.product_image from d_order o left join order_item oi on o.id = oi.order_id left join product p on oi.product_id = p.product_id where o.user_id = #{userId} order by o.order_time desc

select count(d.id) as num from d_order d
and d.order_state=#{id}

select o.id, o.order_state, p.product_id, p.product_name from d_order o left join order_item oi on o.id = oi.order_id left join product p on oi.product_id = p.product_id where o.user_id = #{id} and o.order_state=3 and p.product_id=#{pid}
